fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Control a player to visit you. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If a player visits you, they become infected and learn that they are infected. Infected players are roleblocked on the night after they become infected, and are hit with a Powerful attack the night after that. You do not visit a player that is hit with an attack.
Any player who visits an infected player also becomes infected.
You learn at the beginning of each night the names of all infected players.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
